channel.title: Amsterdam Events Feed
channel.description: Curated upcoming events and activities in Amsterdam from I amsterdam official agenda

item.title: I amsterdam Store
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Check website for prices
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

The I Amsterdam Store at Central Station is the place for everyone who wants to know what to do in the capital and wants to be inspired by the best Amsterdam has to offer.

item.title: Gratis tentoonstelling in de Rjjksmuseumtuinen: Isamu Noguchi
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

Sculpture is everywhere in the world of Isamu Noguchi. What does that look like? Discover his playful sculptures this summer in the free accessible garden exhibition.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Robbie Williams: Pride and Self-Prejudice
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

Robbie Williams, once the radiant center of Take That and now a solo legend, mixes charisma with depth in his music and thus touches many fans. Robbie has reinvented himself with every hit, making him one of the most iconic and versatile British pop stars in the books. His journey, which once started in the shadows of a rehab clinic, shows in Moco Museum how he has transformed his darkest moments into light points.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Moco Masters
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

The modern masters have inspired countless generations and art lovers worldwide. Every master has a unique vision. They use their moment in time to think about the future and present it. They dare to change our world and create work that becomes timeless. With their worldwide impact, Moco Modern Masters found their way to homes and museums around the world - where they shape our collective consciousness. Their names, art and ideas are

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: 750 mensen, één stad
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

After two and a half years of hard work, the volunteers Stefanie Swinkels, Alphons Nieuwenhuis and Michel Bouquet are almost successful: the coffee table book '750 people, one city' is almost ready. The corresponding exhibition can be seen in the garden of De Nederlandsche Bank from 9 May. Access to this event is free and can be visited on 16 May from 12:00.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Tentoonstelling: My veins don't end in me
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

Exhibition by South Asian Contemporary Art Amsterdam 'My Veins Don't End in Me' with the work of Aditi Singh, Amina Ahmed, Tanuja Rane, Varunika Saraf. The work South Asian modern art can only be viewed by appointment. If you want to come by, send an e-mail art@sacartamsterdam.com.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Wunderships
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

In the Expo Wunderships in NDSM Fuse, artists look for something that inspires them or for which they hope. That can be a better future, recognition, balance, guidance, pleasure, or just rest. They do that with softness and patience. Aware of everything that is vulnerable. They have hope, doubt and believe in love. And they like to hoist it in the mast or let travel in the wind to ever arrive in a new world full of safety, a healthy nature, trust, freedom, respect, equality, diverse

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Wandeling Amsterdam 750 hectometer
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

Discover the oldest, newest and greenest parts of the city during this 75 km walk. The walk is divided into 4 stages, but you can also walk the route in more or less days. With a bonus stage you also get through the Weesp district. You can walk the route when it suits you!

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

Kees te Kolsté - Solo: Reflections of a Living Master, shows impressive works from his artistic career that covers more than five decades.

item.title: Queer Geschiedenismaand - expositie Buiten beeld?
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

Queer objects from 5 Dutch museums and archives. Five Dutch museums and archives put an object with queer-theme from their own collection in the spotlights at Ihlia LGBTI Heritage in OBA Oosterdok in the context of the annual queer history month (March). The objects are, framed with Ihlia archive material, equipped with queer historical context. The exhibition can be viewed for free until 15 June.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: BioBlitz Amsterdamse Bos 2025
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

From 24 May to 24 June, the Amsterdamse Bos will turn into a vibrant research area for nature lovers, discoverers and curious visitors. The Bioblitz is back! During this monthly Nature Challenge we will look together for as many types of plants, animals, fungi and other organisms in the Amsterdamse Bos.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Ontdek Oosterdok: interactieve wandelroute in Amsterdam
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

The Oosterdok in Amsterdam is launching Oosterdok: a new interactive walking route with which residents and visitors can discover the hidden stories of this neighborhood. Along the way you will learn more about the transformation of the Oosterdok through games and stories: from the largest port in the world to a bustling place for culture, architecture and innovation.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Dijkreis
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

Go on a journey of discovery through the turbulent history of Amsterdam-Noord. In forty special stories you learn about the history of Amsterdam-Noord on the place where it actually took place.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Openluchttentoonstelling - Elephant Parade Amsterdam Tour 2025
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

Elephant Parade and Biz Damrak Amsterdam are organizing a special open -air exhibition with the Beursplein as the starting point. From 19 May to 29 June 2025, 14 hand -painted elephants and one duck are exhibited. The exhibition in Amsterdam promises to be a visual spectacle that brings together art, culture and nature conservation in an iconic location: Beursplein.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam

item.title: Verhaalpaal Noord
item.description:
📅 Date: Check website for dates
💰 Price: Gratis entree
📍 Location: Amsterdam
🏛️ Source: I Amsterdam Official
ℹ️ Description:

Did you know that Overhoeks is the oldest part of Amsterdam-Noord? And that just behind Eye was the gallows field of Amsterdam? Storypaal Noord is an open-air exhibition about the unknown history of Amsterdam-Noord. Within 45 minutes you walk from pole to pole and you will learn everything about this dynamic district.

🌟 More Info: View Event Details on I amsterdam
